title: We simulated the rest of the NFL season: 48 regular-season games, 13 playoff matchups and one Super Bowl winner
description: We used ESPN Football Power Index's most likely simulation to project Weeks 16, 17 and 18 -- and how the NFL playoff field could stack up.
author: Seth Walder

title: Sooners land QB Mateer, No. 1 player in portal
description: Former Washington State quarterback John Mateer, ESPN's top-ranked player in the transfer portal, has committed to Oklahoma.
author: Max Olson

title: 'He has rebuilt Arsenal' - now Arteta must clear 'hardest hurdle'
description: As Mikel Arteta approaches his fifth anniversary as Arsenal manager, BBC Sport take a closer look at his time in charge.

title: Kist loses despite nine-darter & spectator wins Â£60k
description: Christian Kist hits a nine-darter but loses his PDC Championship first-round match against Madars Razma.

title: Nervy Aspinall comes through Worlds opener as Kist hits nine-darter
description: A nervy Nathan Aspinall stumbled through his World Darts Championship opener, edging past Leonard Gates on the same night that Christian Kist hit a nine-darter in defeat.

title: Amorim: Man Utd are better with Rashford
description: Ruben Amorim has refused to close the door on Marcus Rashford at Manchester United, despite the forward hinting he was ready for a fresh start away from Old Trafford.

title: Four Verts: Bad teams and bad luck abound as teams dream of No. 1 pick
description: With three games to go in the NFL season, seven teams still have a shot at possible top pick Shedeur Sanders (or Travis Hunter!). A less sad topic? Josh Allen.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Chiefs waive former 1st-round RB Clyde Edwards-Helaire
description: Edwards-Helaire revealed in the offseason he's been living with PTSD and has not played this season. He addressed the Chiefs and their fans upon his release: "Love ya KC!"
author: Yahoo Sports
